concept.title: Symptoms of Platten Failure
concept.shortdesc: Common indicators that suggest a malfunction in the platen of a typewriter

ul.li: The platen begins to lose its grip, causing uneven paper feeding.
The typing impression weakens due to reduced friction between the paper and roller surface.
Dirty or hardened platen rollers limit the typewriterâ€™s performance and make the paper slip during typing.
These conditions indicate that the platen may need cleaning, repair, or replacement.
